body: [b8b65c1.txt](https://github.com/golang/go/files/57315/b8b65c1.txt) is the gctrace of this program running for about 1 hour and 45 minutes. Its RSS reached ~750MB. The live heap (the second heap size in the gctrace line) never exceeded 5 MB (checked with `grep -v -- '->[45]->' log.master`). Curiously, the scavenger released a total of only 8MB the whole time.
